name: Mark Smith
description:
Love and laughter is what I am after!!I am happy man, strong, intelligent, affectionate, loyal, independent, somewhat adventurous, love to laugh and make people smile.
I appreciate a woman of good character and integrity. I would love to meet someone who could just crack me up.
I am a sincere, honest, dedicated, responsible, romantic, and passionate young gentleman with a good sense of humor and strong values in search of a best friend, life-long partner, and a true love. Even though I am blessed with a youthful appearance, I have the wisdom of many ages. I value friendship, honesty, loyalty, romance, passion, spirituality, family, and a good laugh.
